title: Lowest Informal Payments to Public Officials
description: In 2023, only 0.1% of firms in Bosnia and Herzegovina reported making informal payments to public officials, indicating a low level of corruption in business dealings.

title: Smallest Air Freight Transport
description: In 2015, Bosnia and Herzegovina's air freight transport was recorded at just 0.000087 million ton-km, highlighting minimal air cargo activity.

title: Minimal Health Expenditure-Induced Poverty
description: In 2015, only 0.01% of Bosnia and Herzegovina's population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, reflecting effective health cost management.

title: High Proportion of Elderly Women
description: As of 2023, 7.69% of the female population in Bosnia and Herzegovina were aged between 65-69, indicating a significant elderly female demographic.

title: Small Population in Largest City
description: In 2024, the largest city in Bosnia and Herzegovina had a population of 346,859, reflecting a relatively small urban center compared to global metropolises.
